about_the_game:
"Heinz Honor & Revenge" is a beat 'em up game that offers an action-packed experience with a deep story and challenging puzzles. Players will take on the role of Heinz, a secret agent fighting for his country against various threats from ruthless criminal syndicates. Heinz is a secret agent with a reputation as a reliable "troubleshooter" in handling the most dangerous and difficult missions. From rescuing important individuals, protecting VIPs, and capturing terrorists. However, when the world's most dangerous criminal syndicate, known as Cataclysm Corp, destroys his life and threatens his country's safety, he is pushed to the limit. On his journey, he will uncover a vast conspiracy that threatens global security.

A PATRIOTIC AND CHALLENGING STORY

Heinz fought tirelessly to eradicate evil for the safety of his country.

ENEMIES AND CHALLENGES


The enemies faced can vary, from regular foes to stronger bosses, each with different attack patterns and weaknesses.

SPECIAL SKILLS

Skills that allow Heinz to use special powers, such as area attacks, to deal with groups of enemies or powerful foes.

content_descriptors.notes: "Our game contains mature content, including violence, strong language, and suggestive themes. Players may encounter combat scenarios with blood effects, intense action sequences, and dramatic story elements. While there are no explicit depictions of sexual acts, the game may include suggestive dialogue and characters with revealing outfits. Additionally, themes such as alcohol consumption and gambling may be present in some parts of the game. However, the game does not include depictions of sexual assault, non-consensual sex, self-harm, or extreme drug abuse. Players who may be sensitive to mature themes should review the game's rating and description before playing."

detailed_description:
"Heinz Honor & Revenge" is a beat 'em up game that offers an action-packed experience with a deep story and challenging puzzles. Players will take on the role of Heinz, a secret agent fighting for his country against various threats from ruthless criminal syndicates. Heinz is a secret agent with a reputation as a reliable "troubleshooter" in handling the most dangerous and difficult missions. From rescuing important individuals, protecting VIPs, and capturing terrorists. However, when the world's most dangerous criminal syndicate, known as Cataclysm Corp, destroys his life and threatens his country's safety, he is pushed to the limit. On his journey, he will uncover a vast conspiracy that threatens global security.

A PATRIOTIC AND CHALLENGING STORY

Heinz fought tirelessly to eradicate evil for the safety of his country.

ENEMIES AND CHALLENGES


The enemies faced can vary, from regular foes to stronger bosses, each with different attack patterns and weaknesses.

name: Heinz Honor and Revenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
